name: AMATEN
short_description: Amaten, a leading gift card company based out of Japan is now building a blockchain based system to solve the electronic gift market with a fraud proof, efficient and easy to use platform
description: Gifts are an inherent part of showing love and care for those around you. The gift world is also moving to electronic and digital form. Amaten, a leading gift card company based out of Japan is now building a blockchain based system to solve the electronic gift market with a fraud proof, efficient and easy to use platform. This platform will integrate with existing merchant systems seamlessly to give a simple, fast and superior user experience.
